title: Alpha PBE client to Alpha Live servers
body: ive got alpha client for the pbe and was wondering if there was a way to get the alpha for live servers?

replies.body:
These are different systems, so you'll want to be sure to sign up for access [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/signup)

Check out our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ) for a complete rundown on how the system works. Let me know if you have any other questions.
